title: Canva Design Mastery
description: Master professional design skills from basics to advanced branding and marketing materials

challenges.title: Canva Interface Mastery
challenges.description: Navigate Canva like a pro and understand all key tools
challenges.instructions: Guide the user through the Canva interface, explaining the editor, templates, elements panel, text tools, and keyboard shortcuts for efficient workflow.
hints: Open Canva.com and create a free account
Explore the homepage and template library
Create a blank design to see the editor interface
Learn the left sidebar: Templates, Elements, Text, Uploads
Master keyboard shortcuts: C for crop, T for text, G for group

challenges.title: Typography Fundamentals
challenges.description: Master font pairing, hierarchy, and professional text layouts
challenges.instructions: Teach the user about typography principles: font pairing, hierarchy, spacing, and readability. Show how to use Canva's text tools to create professional-looking designs.
hints: Understand font families: Serif, Sans-serif, Display, Script
Pair fonts using the 'Font Pairing' feature or complementary styles
Create visual hierarchy with size, weight, and color
Use letter spacing and line height for readability
Apply text effects like shadows and outlines sparingly

challenges.title: Color Theory for Designers
challenges.description: Learn color psychology and create stunning color palettes
challenges.instructions: Guide the user through color theory basics, color psychology, and how to create harmonious color palettes. Show how to use Canva's color palette generator and apply colors consistently.
hints: Understand the color wheel: complementary, analogous, triadic
Use Canva's color palette generator from photos
Learn color psychology (blue=trust, red=urgency, green=growth)
Create brand colors and save them to your brand kit
Maintain 60-30-10 rule: 60% dominant, 30% secondary, 10% accent

challenges.title: Layout and Composition Principles
challenges.description: Master design principles: balance, alignment, and white space
challenges.instructions: Teach fundamental design principles including rule of thirds, visual hierarchy, balance, alignment, and effective use of white space.
hints: Apply the rule of thirds for focal points
Use grids and guides for perfect alignment
Balance elements: symmetrical vs asymmetrical
Embrace white space - don't overcrowd designs
Create visual flow with directional elements

challenges.title: Working with Images and Graphics
challenges.description: Edit photos, remove backgrounds, and use graphics effectively
challenges.instructions: Show the user how to use Canva's photo editing tools, background remover, filters, and how to combine photos with graphics for professional results.
hints: Use Background Remover for transparent images
Apply filters and adjustments (brightness, contrast, saturation)
Crop and frame images effectively
Combine photos with shapes and overlays
Use Canva's AI image tools like Magic Eraser and Expand

challenges.title: Brand Identity Design
challenges.description: Create a complete brand identity with logo, colors, and style guide
challenges.instructions: Guide the user through creating a cohesive brand identity including logo design, color palette, typography, and brand guidelines using Canva's Brand Kit.
hints: Design a simple, memorable logo using shapes and text
Create a primary and secondary color palette (3-5 colors)
Choose 2-3 brand fonts for consistency
Set up Brand Kit to save all brand elements
Create brand templates for consistency across materials

challenges.title: Social Media Content Creation
challenges.description: Design engaging posts, stories, and covers for all platforms
challenges.instructions: Teach the user to create platform-specific content with correct dimensions, design engaging visuals that stop scrolling, and batch-create content efficiently.
hints: Use correct dimensions for each platform (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn)
Create eye-catching thumbnails with bold text and visuals
Design story templates with interactive elements
Use animation and video features for dynamic content
Batch-create content using 'Duplicate' and 'Resize' features

challenges.title: Marketing Materials Mastery
challenges.description: Design professional flyers, posters, brochures, and ads
challenges.instructions: Show how to create effective marketing materials including flyers, posters, business cards, and digital ads with strong calls-to-action.
hints: Create clear hierarchy: headline, subheading, body, CTA
Use high-quality images that relate to your message
Include strong, action-oriented CTAs (Call To Actions)
Design for both print (300 DPI) and digital (72 DPI)
Add bleed areas for print materials (3mm edge buffer)

challenges.title: Advanced Animation and Video
challenges.description: Create animated graphics, video content, and presentations
challenges.instructions: Guide the user through Canva's animation features, video editing tools, and how to create engaging animated content for social media and presentations.
hints: Apply animations to elements (fade, rise, pan)
Create animated presentations with page transitions
Edit video clips: trim, add music, apply filters
Design animated social media posts and ads
Export videos in different formats and resolutions

challenges.title: Templates and Design Systems
challenges.description: Build reusable templates and maintain design consistency
challenges.instructions: Teach the user to create custom templates, use components, and build a design system for consistent, efficient design workflow.
hints: Create master templates for recurring design needs
Use 'Save as template' to build a template library
Create style components for buttons, headers, etc.
Share templates with team members
Update templates to apply changes across all instances

challenges.title: Canva AI Tools Mastery
challenges.description: Leverage AI-powered features for faster, better designs
challenges.instructions: Show the user how to use Canva's AI tools including Magic Write, Text to Image, Magic Design, and other AI features to enhance creativity and speed.
hints: Use Magic Write for copy generation and editing
Generate images with Text to Image AI
Try Magic Design for instant template creation
Use Magic Eraser to remove unwanted elements
Experiment with AI-powered background generation

challenges.title: Presentation Design Excellence
challenges.description: Create stunning, professional presentations that captivate
challenges.instructions: Guide the user to design compelling presentations with strong visual storytelling, data visualization, and professional polish.
hints: Start with a strong opening slide that hooks attention
Use one idea per slide for clarity
Visualize data with charts, graphs, and infographics
Apply consistent template throughout presentation
Use presenter notes and practice with Presenter View

challenges.title: Print Design Fundamentals
challenges.description: Design for print: business cards, posters, and merchandise
challenges.instructions: Teach print-specific design considerations including resolution, color modes (CMYK), bleed, and how to prepare files for professional printing.
hints: Set designs to 300 DPI for print quality
Understand CMYK vs RGB color modes
Add 3mm bleed for designs with edge-to-edge printing
Use standard print sizes (A4, US Letter, etc.)
Download as PDF for best print results

challenges.title: Collaboration and Workflow
challenges.description: Master team collaboration, comments, and approval workflows
challenges.instructions: Show the user how to collaborate with teams, use comments and feedback features, set up brand permissions, and manage design workflows efficiently.
hints: Share designs with view, comment, or edit access
Use comments for feedback and revisions
Set up team folders for organization
Create approval workflows with stakeholders
Use version history to track changes

challenges.title: Portfolio Project: Complete Brand Campaign
challenges.description: Create a complete brand campaign across multiple formats
challenges.instructions: Challenge the user to create a full brand campaign including logo, social media content, presentation, flyer, and business card - demonstrating all learned skills.
hints: Choose a business or personal brand to design for
Create a complete brand identity (logo, colors, fonts)
Design 5 social media posts with consistent branding
Create a 5-slide pitch presentation
Design a flyer and business card
Ensure consistency across all materials
